# AUTOGENERATED HYPR CONFIG.

# autogenerated = 1 # remove this line to remove the warning

# This is an example Hyprland config file.
# Refer to the wiki for more information.
# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Configuring-Hyprland/

# Please note not all available settings / options are set here.
# For a full list, see the wiki

# You can split this configuration into multiple files
# Create your files separately and then link them to this file like this:
# source = ~/.config/hypr/myColors.conf


################
### MONITORS ###
################

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Monitors/
# monitor=,preferred,auto,auto
# source = ~/.config/hypr/monitors.conf
monitor=DP-3,1920x1080@240.0,0x0,1.0


###################
### MY PROGRAMS ###
###################

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Keywords/

# Set programs that you use
$terminal = foot
$fileManager = thunar
$menu = fuzzel


#################
### AUTOSTART ###
#################

# Autostart necessary processes (like notifications daemons, status bars, etc.)
# Or execute your favorite apps at launch like this:

exec-once = lxqt-policykit-agent
exec-once = ags-wrapped
exec-once = dunst
exec-once = nm-applet &
exec-once = steam -silent -nofriendsui -console
exec-once = hyprctl setcursor Volantes 24
exec-once = wl-paste --type text --watch cliphist store
exec-once = wl-paste --type image --watch cliphist store
exec-once = nwg-drawer -r -fm $fileManager -ft -term $terminal -wm hyprland
exec-once = sleep 3; vesktop --start-minimized
exec-once = sleep 5; input-remapper-control --command autoload
exec-once = sleep 3; obs --startreplaybuffer --minimize-to-tray --disable-shutdown-check


#############################
### ENVIRONMENT VARIABLES ###
#############################

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Environment-variables/

env = XCURSOR_THEME,VolantesX
env = XCURSOR_SIZE,24
# env = HYPRCURSOR_THEME,Volantes
# env = HYPRCURSOR_SIZE,24

# env = LIBVA_DRIVER_NAME,nvidia
# env = __GLX_VENDOR_LIBRARY_NAME,nvidia
# env = NVD_BACKEND,direct

env = ELECTRON_OZONE_PLATFORM_HINT, wayland



#####################
### LOOK AND FEEL ###
#####################

# Refer to https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#general
general {
    gaps_in = 5
    gaps_out = 3

    border_size = 1

    no_border_on_floating = true

    # https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#variable-types for info about colors
    col.active_border = rgba(33ccffee) rgba(00ff99ee) 45deg
    col.inactive_border = rgba(595959aa)

    # Set to true enable resizing windows by clicking and dragging on borders and gaps
    resize_on_border = true

    # Please see https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Tearing/ before you turn this on
    allow_tearing = true

    # layout = dwindle
    layout = hy3
    ## wait till new version
    # snap {
    #    enabled = true
    # }
}

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#decoration
decoration {
    rounding = 5

    # Change transparency of focused and unfocused windows
    active_opacity = 1.0
    inactive_opacity = 1.0

    # drop_shadow = true
    # shadow_range = 4
    # shadow_render_power = 3
    # col.shadow = rgba(1a1a1aee)

    # https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#blur
    blur {
        enabled = true
        size = 3
        passes = 1
	xray = true
        vibrancy = 0.1696
    }
}

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#animations
animations {
    enabled = true

    # Default animations, see https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Animations/ for more

    bezier = myBezier, 0.05, 0.9, 0.1, 1.05

    animation = windows, 1, 5, myBezier
    animation = windowsOut, 1, 5, default, popin 80%
    animation = border, 1, 8, default
    animation = borderangle, 1, 5, default
    animation = fade, 1, 4, default
    animation = workspaces, 1, 5, default
}

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Dwindle-Layout/ for more
dwindle {
    pseudotile = true # Master switch for pseudotiling. Enabling is bound to mainMod + P in the keybinds section below
    preserve_split = true # You probably want this
    smart_split = true
}

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Master-Layout/ for more
master {
    new_status = master
}

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#misc
misc {
    force_default_wallpaper = -1 # Set to 0 or 1 to disable the anime mascot wallpapers
    disable_hyprland_logo = false # If true disables the random hyprland logo / anime girl background. :(

    mouse_move_enables_dpms = true
    key_press_enables_dpms = true
}


#############
### INPUT ###
#############

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#input
input {
    kb_layout = us
    kb_variant =
    kb_model =
    kb_rules =

    follow_mouse = 1
    numlock_by_default = true

    sensitivity = 0 # -1.0 - 1.0, 0 means no modification.

    touchpad {
        natural_scroll = false
    }

    accel_profile = flat
}

# https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Variables/#gestures
gestures {
    workspace_swipe = false

}

# Example per-device config
# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Keywords/#per-device-input-configs for more
device {
    name = epic-mouse-v1
    sensitivity = -0.5
}

cursor {
    no_warps = true
}

plugin {
  hy3 {
    no_gaps_when_only = 0
    tab_first_window = false
    tabs {
      text_center = true
    }
    autotile {
      enable = true
      workspaces = not:8
    }
  }
  overview {
    centerAligned = false
  }

}

####################
### KEYBINDINGSS ###
####################

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Keywords/
$mainMod = ALT
bind = , Print, exec, grimBlast


# OBS Global Shortcut
bind = , F10, execr, obs-cmd replay save



# Example binds, see https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Binds/ for more
bind = $mainMod, Return, exec, $terminal

bind = $mainMod, Q, killactive,
bind = $mainMod, W, killactive,

bindr = SUPER, SUPER_L, exec, $menu
bind = $mainMod, E, exec, $fileManager

bind = $mainMod, R, exec, $menu
bind = $mainMod, V, togglefloating,

bind = $mainMod, F, exec, zen

bind = $mainMod, F9, tagwindow, immediate


# Move focus with mainMod + hjkl keys
bind = $mainMod, H, hy3:movefocus, l
bind = $mainMod, L, hy3:movefocus, r
bind = $mainMod, K, hy3:movefocus, u
bind = $mainMod, J, hy3:movefocus, d



# Move window with mainMod + SHIFT + arrow/hjkl
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, left, hy3:movewindow, l
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, H, hy3:movewindow, l
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, right, hy3:movewindow, r
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, L, hy3:movewindow, r
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, up, hy3:movewindow, u
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, K, hy3:movewindow, u
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, down, hy3:movewindow, d
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, J, hy3:movewindow, d


bind = $mainMod, I, hy3:changegroup, opposite


# Switch workspaces with mainMod + [0-9]
bind = $mainMod, 1, workspace, 1
bind = $mainMod, KP_1, workspace, 1
bind = $mainMod, 2, workspace, 2
bind = $mainMod, KP_2, workspace, 2
bind = $mainMod, 3, workspace, 3
bind = $mainMod, KP_3, workspace, 3
bind = $mainMod, 4, workspace, 4
bind = $mainMod, KP_4, workspace, 4
bind = $mainMod, 5, workspace, 5
bind = $mainMod, KP_5, workspace, 5
bind = $mainMod, 6, workspace, 6
bind = $mainMod, KP_6, workspace, 6
bind = $mainMod, 7, workspace, 7
bind = $mainMod, KP_7, workspace, 7
bind = $mainMod, 8, workspace, 8
bind = $mainMod, KP_8, workspace, 8
bind = $mainMod, 0, workspace, 8
bind = $mainMod, KP_8, workspace, 8

# Move active window to a workspace with mainMod + SHIFT + [0-9]
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 1, movetoworkspacesilent, 1
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 2, movetoworkspacesilent, 2
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 3, movetoworkspacesilent, 3
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 4, movetoworkspacesilent, 4
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 5, movetoworkspacesilent, 5
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 6, movetoworkspacesilent, 6
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 7, movetoworkspacesilent, 7
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, 8, movetoworkspacesilent, 8



# Example special workspace (scratchpad)
# bind = $mainMod, S, togglespecialworkspace, magic
# bind = $mainMod SHIFT, S, movetoworkspace, special:magic
bind = $mainMod, M, movetoworkspacesilent, 8
bind = $mainMod SHIFT, M, fullscreen, 0


# Scroll through existing workspaces with mainMod + scroll
bind = $mainMod, right, workspace, +1
bind = $mainMod, left, workspace, -1
bind = $mainMod, Tab, overview:toggle


bind = SUPER, V, exec, nwg-clipman
bind = $mainMod, Space, exec, nwg-drawer



# Move/resize windows with mouse buttons and dragging
bindm = $mainMod, mouse:272, movewindow
bindm = , mouse:276, movewindow


bindm = $mainMod, mouse:273, resizewindow
bindm = , mouse:275, resizewindow



bind = $mainMod, equal, submap, resize
bind = $mainMod, O, submap, resize

submap = resize
binde = , l, resizeactive, 10 0
binde = , k, resizeactive, 0 -10
binde = , j, resizeactive, 0 10
binde = , h, resizeactive, -10 0
binde = , catchall, submap, reset
submap = reset


##############################
### WINDOWS AND WORKSPACES ###
##############################

# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Window-Rules/ for more
# See https://wiki.hyprland.org/Configuring/Workspace-Rules/ for workspace rules

# Example windowrule v1
# windowrule = float, ^(kitty)$

# Example windowrule v2
# windowrulev2 = float,class:^(kitty)$,title:^(kitty)$




windowrulev2 = suppressevent maximize, class:.* # You'll probably like this
windowrulev2 = float, class:(clipse)
windowrulev2 = size 622 652, class:(clipse)
windowrulev2 = opacity 0.0 override, class:^(xwaylandvideobridge)$
windowrulev2 = noanim, class:^(xwaylandvideobridge)$
windowrulev2 = noinitialfocus, class:^(xwaylandvideobridge)$
windowrulev2 = maxsize 1 1, class:^(xwaylandvideobridge)$
windowrulev2 = noblur, class:^(xwaylandvideobridge)$
windowrulev2 = float, title:Picture-in-Picture
